title: Movie Night
excerpt: Join us for Movie Night to watch The Dark Knight and enjoy a relaxed evening with fellow members.
description: Get ready for a relaxed night of cinema and snacks! We’re screening The Dark Knight, one of the greatest superhero films of all time. Enjoy popcorn, hang out with fellow members, and participate in a post-movie chat. Come hang out, meet new people, and enjoy a legendary movie night on campus.
